# pgrneo4jaura_auraprojects (Data Source)

Data lookup for Neo4j Aura project configurations

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "pgrneo4jaura_auraprojects" "projects" {
	tenant_id = "<YOUR TENANT ID>"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `tenant_id` (String) Neo4j Aura tenant identifier.

### Read-Only

- `instance_configurations` (Set of Object) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--instance_configurations))
- `name` (String) The tenant name.

<a id="nestedatt--instance_configurations"></a>
### Nested Schema for `instance_configurations`

Read-Only:

- `cloud_provider` (String)
- `memory` (String)
- `region` (String)
- `region_name` (String)
- `storage` (String)
- `type` (String)
- `version` (String)
